Class MicroserviceGrpcService

public class MicroserviceGrpcService extends com.telenav.kivakit.component.BaseComponent implements com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.lifecycle.Initializable, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable, com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.internal.protocols.MicroservletMountTarget
GRPC protocol service that allows MicroservletRequestHandlers to be mounted with mount(String, Class) in the Initializable.onInitialize() method (only). The service is created in Microservice.onNewGrpcService() ()} automatically started by the microservice framework on startup.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    • mount

      public void mount​(String path, Class<? extends MicroservletRequestHandler> requestHandlerType)
      Mounts the given request class on the given path.
      Specified by:
      mount in interface com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.internal.protocols.MicroservletMountTarget
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the given microservlet request handler (requestType). If the path is not absolute (doesn't start with a '/'), it is prefixed with: "/api/[major.version].[minor.version]/", where the version is retrieved from Microservice.version(). For example, the path "users" in microservlet version 3.1 will resolve to "/api/3.1/users", and the path "/users" will resolve to "/users".
      requestHandlerType - The type of the request handler

    • start

      Starts this GRPC service
